inventory=[{"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 16}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 35, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 7, "index": 18}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 22}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_trapdoor", "quantity": 25, "index": 41}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft green_stained_glass_pane, I need to first craft green_stained_glass. To craft green_stained_glass, I need to place 8 glass_pane in the crafting grid and 1 green_dye in the middle. Since I already have 6 green_stained_glass in slot 34, I will first move 1 of them into the crafting grid to save time.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1
